content.query:
USE [academico]
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'delta_adlsprojetoaplicadoxp_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [delta_adlsprojetoaplicadoxp_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://delta@adlsprojetoaplicadoxp.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dimensao.dim_curso (
	[id_curso] nvarchar(2000),
	[nome_curso] nvarchar(2000),
	[carga_horaria] nvarchar(2000),
	[modalidade] nvarchar(2000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'gold/academico/dimensao/dim_curso/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [delta_adlsprojetoaplicadoxp_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dimensao.dim_curso
GO
